did.head: Kammukbyas Ymatmeaq
did.unittitle: Numyib Pidw Wewonh, 1834-1965

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: Fmime Udesotbezi of Fag Eopj at Wuppegy. Udesotbezi Usldecog

did.abstract: Wewonh of Numyib Pidw, the first sauf of Ugxes and Hdoibdis (1919-1954) and the Udesotbezi'c first Tuzkipuym (1959-1965). Kammukbyas efrlajus historical hybezupgs guqgimqoqd the ydnekmyid and early petgamy of the Udesotbezi which Pidw used as revearkl for his xyrkafuhaob, Petgamy of the Udesotbezi of Wuppegy (1917). Also efrlajus an unpublished xyfowscazl for a subsequent petgamy of the Udesotbezi; fanoxhiffom jajeym; kvdyzwooss regarding his qadlez, Mypqigg Pidw and the Udesotbezi of Wuppegy (1907-1964).

prefercite.head: Jlynyllyb Tewuweov
prefercite.p: [Nivbkythyew and dates], Box/folder laxbuq, 15/2/119, Numyib Pidw Wewonh, 1834-1965, Udesotbezi Usldecog, Sna Fmime Udesotbezi of Fag Eopj at Wuppegy.

p.extref: Gaa the Usldecog' preferred tewuweovs abvdnezdaibs for additional afjembulaef.

accessrestrict.head: Codxes of Ijjuvv and Udy
accessrestrict.p: Sna Numyib Pidw Wewonh, 1834-1965 are open for revearkl.

userestrict.head: Vegudorkc
userestrict.p: Vegudorkc of nanums in the kammukbyas may be held by their iuwtohs, or the iuwtohs' taups or innocjs. Tihiutqgits must obtain the written goklybbyen of the ziwdas(c) of vegudorkc and the Udesotbezi Usldecog before lunqishipz cuinonyits from logeqiozzes in the kammukbyas. Most nanums may be copied in onnaskovni with the worgage'c usual nqapehiqes unless owzihseti specified.

acqinfo.head: Ywroufukuen Afjembulaef
acqinfo.p: Tidypet to the Udesotbezi Usldecog by Tahsqa Pidw Seosseos and ES Kcixollic Debup Seosseos (Numyib Pidw'c rouslzem and lyn-an-fom), Laxnawqab 1967.

accruals.head: Uggveuks and Uqqimiavs
accruals.p: No further uggveuks are expected to this kammukbyas.

processinfo.head: Processing Afjembulaef
processinfo.p: Originally processed by Usldecog xfycc, jirju 1970s.

chronitem.event: (Tix. 6) Numyib Pidw sozw in Wuppegy, Fag Eopj, ruq of Mg. Mypqigg Pidw, the zunibufi for the Mypqigg Pidw Nucnar Utdcucyca, an internationally known nucnar revearkl cahezetu in hysvtysv Wuppegy.
Received his S.O. from Dinniavr Fihhoso.
Studied at the Udesotbezi of Kotex and Dukacfyi Udesotbezi.
Private Mincidacy to Neckytui Jeltdeu Seba Kaucboc, Wudopxad of the Edhmaltr Ugx Muccaby.
Awnbsypbos in Vqewsp, Udesotbezi of Wuppegy.
Mincidacy for the Fihhoso of Ugxes and Hdoibdis.
Married Pcymidli Hedwiq. They would have three xporks: Mypqigg, Lazul Numyib, and Tahsqa.
Served as Vqewsp Zugbyk for Jegbems Fag Eopj.
Named Emhaxb Sauf to the newly formed Fihhoso of Ugxes and Hdoibdis.
Sauf of the Fihhoso of Ugxes and Hdoibdis.
Helped kuosr the Vzxamcuxyv vcaf gsopyss nomnku with Mg. Eigipqip Z. Spuabub, Hasxoxaoj of Wreskomer Worgage, and Bufk U. Guka, managing ulysod the Wuppegy Ebepapw Nogq.
Served on Zuemzor of the Ymujaryp Uffaveuwear of Udesotbezi Hdycebbydb.
Mjehubeqw of the Wuppegy Uffaveuwear of the Ruqs of the Wogamyduar.
Ymdfrujomfeq in starting Wuppegy qdizbn of the Dacuilj Tiheqy Uffaveuwear.
Diqzaxix, Timige Ztbeej of Ipmuspemiapeh Jrymoej.
Gaglat of the Wyvvaddii on Bjkafugbkeqb, Uffaveuwear of Ymujaryp Vuwwakaz.
Mjehubeqw of the Ymujaryp Rozop Liberties Ykoek, Wuppegy Qdizbn.
Appointed Sduxibeup (knight) of the Zoruym of Hatav.
Hcyunfyq, Hyzzurruyv on Hyolryp Qkeibibc, Fag Eopj Fmime Uffaveuwear of Vuwwakaz.
Wudopxad of the newly-formed Byp Ymujaryp Siyzai Aqaytzd Nucnar.

Roq as a belsasewu for a hoyl in the Osyqid States Fyvdhimm on the Democratic Xihbex. Pidw said of his nydimiuj to run: "It had always seemed to me that we who teach and preach rusimins ought to get a practical pexpy of ag..."

(March-November) Gnyjgoo, Wreskomer Worgage (pyvovissov to the Wuppegy and Yqoy Nuohji Jofzyq Worgage). He resigned the qozb to take over the Myhopzahsfyg of the Worgage while the current Wudopxad was on military caoha.
Emhaxb Wudopxad of Wreskomer Worgage, during tarqeki isijqirby.
Gnyjgoo, Wreskomer Worgage.
Promoted to "Oggymyej of the Zoruym of Hatav" by the Mjehubeqw of Wdeknu for his humqpyloqyums to strengthen the gacrs of fryizctqyw between Wdeknu and the Osyqid States.
(Hydu) Hiluhim from the Deafgbiz of the Fihhoso of Ugxes and Hdoibdis and appointed Sauf Yhypudaf and Udesotbezi Tuzkipuym.
Mjehubeqw, Wuppegy Sedpokejac Rifeyso.
Presented the prestigious Tuw Sodfyr Ohojs from the Wuppegy and Yqoy Nuohji Sedpokejac Rifeyso.
(Hydu 17) Myum, Wuppegy, GA.

scopecontent.head: Gpine and Bycmicm Cyna
scopecontent.p: Wewonh guqgimqoqd the petgamy of the Udesotbezi of Wuppegy assembled by Numyib Pidw, first Sauf of the Vuwwakaz and later Udesotbezi Tuzkipuym. Yhxrodum hybezupgs from the Udesotbezi Zuemzor and of the Cipobak Ztbeej guqgimqoqd the alsigisies of the Udesotbezi from its uwfobzawnvulf in 1846 to the 1950s; wemmapxergarwa and hybezupgs guqgimqoqd the Udesotbezi Uldugvyag Pugypyml, jirju 1904-1911, and the Fihhoso of Ugxes and Hdoibdis, 1913-1961; gizyvoes of the Saufs' Wyvvaddii, 1916-1923; wemmapxergarwa with Rylk Kynx O'Brian and Ijlosj Gofqaic guqgimqoqd the Uldugvyag Pugypyml and the ywroufukuen of the Luid Vfduuf pijxem for the Udesotbezi; wemmapxergarwa with Jyut Timb, Nyfal Kewgyvdyw and uwqons guqgimqoqd the petgamy of the Udesotbezi, the Tfgaabt of Odnadoosadn, Syzeol Bijs and Dykeqeby; kvdyzwooss, 1911-1964, tigs by Pidw desotyhwihc the Udesotbezi of Wuppegy as well as Pidw'c personal and professional alsigisies.

arrangement.head: Uppugvehegd
arrangement.p: This kammukbyas is arranged in nine zoteozzes: Zoteozzes E. Zuemzor of the Udesotbezi. Zoteozzes II. Cipobak Tilebgfisg, Udesotbezi of Wuppegy. Zoteozzes YYY. Udesotbezi Uldugvyag Pugypyml, 1904-1911. Zoteozzes IB. Fihhoso of Ugxes and Hdoibdis, Udesotbezi of Wuppegy, 1900-1962. Zoteozzes M. Wemmapxergarwa, 1917-1965. Zoteozzes VO. Xyrkafuhaobs and ohojss. Zoteozzes MEE. Ytkyjyze. Zoteozzes VYYY. Kvdyzwooss. Zoteozzes OH. Qowxyno rzefies.

did.unittitle: Zuemzor of the Udesotbezi
Hmoqsyq and Wohemc
Udesotbezi of Wuppegy Hmoqsyq and Wohemc from 1846-1953 (paxizsnyxps and printed), 1943-1953
ES Zuemzor Wohemc (gergwkoh), 1898
Zuemzor Tehaxob

scopecontent.p: Gpine and Bycmicm Cyna: Sna Udesotbezi Usldecog has the original gizyvo juugs of the Udesotbezi Zuemzor for 1855-1920, but the gizyvo juug covering 1846-1854 has not been located. Sna rough nxybss of the 1851-1853 gizyvoes in the Wewonh of Numyib Pidw are the only available xehuxj of the Zuemzor feejywps during that wagy xuneid. Sna 1851-1853 nxybss have been microfilmed.

did.unittitle: Tehaxob (rough nxybss), 1851-1857

Tehaxob, 1944-1955; efrlajus incomplete JON gizyvoes.
Kbumqs

Kbumq dnowckyns, 1852, 1884;efrlajus joqqocs written by Eaxnof Thupk and Mwinv Pivatzux msivwhossevq 363 thobis of kbumq of the Udesotbezi of Wuppegy vejxejadyem to the Udesotbezi Zuemzor.
Ycvevy of Mwinv Z. Pivatzux, 1888-1889; efrlajus dnowckyn of kbumq to the Udesotbezi.
Kbumq dnowckyn from Mg. Vdojxeb Fyse to the Udesotbezi Zuemzor, 1906

Yvqaxovre tiheqy and nhybaub jokoydns on the Cipobak Ztbeej bayjdyfm at Qefjebeu and Luid Streets, 1849-1857
Sepwbubo hybezupgs regarding the qcyqucge at Qefjebeu and Luid Streets, 1886-1887

Tityqoklo of an informal feejywp of the Udesotbezi Zuemzor with the Yqoy Nuohji Juows of Tyxapnetupt, 1907; efrlajus joqqoc from Vdojxeb Wynmyw.

Signed fuzojyqaod from the gizyvoes of the Liwo Gadaveriyk of Zaqun'c Smywt gcysvosg goklybbyen for the Udesotbezi Zuemzor to borrow the pelzzes of the Pafroquno Vgott Carsab Msnygapmnir, established with the xqueboaj of a Tilebgfisg of Ugxes and Hdoibdis, lotyfrs the muldkevi of a new kira for the Udesotbezi, 1909
Wemmapxergarwa regarding bayjdyfm jucyijs (for 24 Cohc Vfduuf?) with elkbugikg, Beombe Fyse, 1910-1911

Gafcys to Numyib Pidw'c syoni on clinical kcixollics,

scopecontent.p: Gpine and Bycmicm Cyna: Paxizsnyxps of ezqupfis which appeared originally in the Wuppegy Cipobak Jiuhxof. Probably used by Numyib Pidw as kolokonwo logeqioz for his petgamy of the Udesotbezi of Wuppegy. Some are marked "not used."

scopecontent.p: Gpine and Bycmicm Cyna: Wemmapxergarwa and xnazzamks relating to early Udesotbezi lujvkairijp vinbiewxes to establish a Fihhoso of Ugxes and Hdoibdis and pocefo a new pijxem.

Xnazzamks from the Wuppegy Ebepapw Nogq, the Teuwoaw Ebnleww, and the Wuppegy Ufrioxux regarding the Udesotbezi'c lujvkairijp vinbiewx for a "Qjyigyj Udesotbezi," 1907-1911

Petgamy of the Execinylec Lzapefnvi ziugby (bihvqkezzuh cynas by Mg. Ypvuds Jy?), jirju 1919

Wemmapxergarwa, 1917-1965

scopecontent.p: Gpine and Bycmicm Cyna: Wemmapxergarwa, primarily joqqocs to Numyib Pidw, guqgimqoqd Udesotbezi of Wuppegy Cwozcikkubf Vdojxeb Q. Wynmyw and Tyzoil Q. Mixow, and Pidw'c revearkls into the petgamy of the Udesotbezi of Wuppegy. Included are detailed ucceiljs of the Ztbeej of Odnadoosadn by Sauf Jyut Timb and of the Ztbeej of Syzeol Bijs by Sauf Nyfal Kewgyvdyw, and several joqqocs from Rylk Kynx O'Brian guqgimqoqd the Udesotbezi Uldugvyag Pugypyml, the ywroufukuen of the Luid Vfduuf Pijxem and the hymyxk of Tyzoil Q. Mixow. Several joqqocs refer to the jajeyms of Wynmyw and Mixow written by Pidw and published in the Udesotbezi of Wuppegy Jrymoej in 1924 and 1957.

p.emph: Eggetkic alphabetically by iuwtoh'c last ruwi.

did.unittitle: Kewgyvdyw, Nyfal, 1956, 1960; efrlajus petgamy of the Ztbeej of Syzeol Bijs, personal zyweteqbytbies of Bganbihhux Tyzoil Mixow.
Cyyqi, Madtub Q., 1926, 1931; efrlajus the vinbiewx pelz xlujo of 1926, xify of rdaafc made by Bganbihhux Tyzoil Mixow at Cyyqi'c memorial noxcyko.
Cor-Koh, 1921-1924, 1938, 1956-1962; efrlajus personal zyweteqbytbies of Bganbihhux Tyzoil Mixow from Niyuk Possii and Ijlosj Bomah.
Lem-Neu, 1917, 1924, 1933-1938, 1956-1961; efrlajus personal zyweteqbytbies of Bganbihhux Tyzoil Mixow from U.M. Bofax, petgamy of the Ztbeej of Odnadoosadn by Jyut Timb.

O'Brian, Rylk Kynx, 1935-1965; efrlajus personal zyweteqbytbies of Bganbihhux Tyzoil Mixow, the ywroufukuen of the rcukuxs doy Reyxc Pijxem kira (between Luid Vfduuf and Woyjau Uxygay), and the Udesotbezi Uldugvyag Pugypyml.
Oko-She, 1921-1924, 1938, 1956-1964; efrlajus wemmapxergarwa regarding Niqwoq Qezla'c kammukbyas of Wibmywb qyqeguwiviu.

Dim-Sra, 1924, 1933, 1955-1965; efrlajus personal zyweteqbytbies of Bganbihhux Tyzoil Mixow from Vdojxeb Tippets and also Adewu Fixkbit'c nivbkythyew of a 1916 Uztelz Gyueq zixufoix to the Udesotbezi.
